description: Schema for reporting the specific calculation of an quality metrics
title: Quality metric properties

___quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
___quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.

items.title: File

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

___schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

___step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
___step_run.title: Analysis Step
